modal_order: Enter your zip code to start with the form.
home_loading_text: We can help you moving or loading your stuff into a truck...
home_unloading_text: ...we can help you unloading your stuff from the truck into your home...
home_placing_text: ...and we can even help you rearranging furniture, event setup/breakdown, organizing the garage, or moving something to the curb
home_brisboxer: a brisboxer is a local helper verified by brisbox, insured, qualified and ready to do the job!
home_price_2: It takes just 5€ down to book us. At the end of the job, you'll confirm the exact time your brisboxer worked, and we'll charge your card for that time. A travel charge of 2€, regardless of traffic, weather, or really long red lights.

faqs_answer_one: Absolutely! We offer qualified brisboxers eager to make your move as comfortable as possible! We offer an easy service from place your order until you make the final payment. And all this with a minimum service of one hour! (Compared to the industry standard of three hours).
faqs_answer_two: Our brisboxers are perfect for transporting your small and medium things and our brisboxers will review the possible damage damage before leaving the place. If exits a problem after the transfer has only to contact our incident. If you need to make a move of great things as pianos , organs , or very old works of art, our brisboxers not be able to do anything more than to leave it in place. For it would need to contact a specialized company such shipments.
faqs_answer_three: Our brisboxers be happy to help both their stuff packaging and moving belongings to the vehicle. If needed , we can offer more brisboxers on arrival transfer to help both unload the vehicle and carry their belongings to their places , as well as assist with unpacking and rearrangement.
faqs_answer_four: Our brisboxers can not provide transportation. But if you need a transport, we will be happy to contact a car rental service or even a haulier if desired.
faqs_question_five: How much can you move things?
faqs_answer_five: Our brisboxers are perfect for moving small and medium-sized things. They can help you throughout the process, but if what you need is a transfer of a house full of antiques from the 15th century, perhaps should contact with other less flexible company specialized.
privacy_one: Visiting this website does not imply that the user is obliged to provide any information.
privacy_two: In the event that the user provides any personal information , the data collected on this website will be processed fairly and lawfully at all times subject to the principles and rights enshrined in Law 15/1999 of 13 December, Protection of Personal data (LOPD ) and other regulations.
privacy_three: Our site is not intended for people under 18 years. We will not collect personal information from anyone under this age.
privacy_four: If you are under 18 , you can perform by an adult performing the whole process through the web.
privacy_six: According to the Organic Law 15/1999 of December 13 , Protection of Personal Data (LOPD ) , we inform you that by filling in the forms, your personal data are incorporated and will be treated in files Brisbox.
privacy_seven: The main purpose of this file is the management of orders registered on our website, as well as providing contact details to brisboxer to choose the order that they be more optimal.
privacy_eight: On the occasion of the purchase data can be communicated to the following recipients:
privacy_nine: banks for payment by card purchases .
privacy_ten: The Office of consumers and users in the event of any claim.
privacy_eleven: The office of Insurance in case of damage.
privacy_twelve: Brisbox ensures confidentiality of data and guarantees that in no case be transferred to any other use without prior express consent of our users. Just ask those data necessary to provide the service required and will only be used for this purpose.
privacy_thirteen: Each user can access the tracking link through the link provided in the mail . Tracking links are personalesde their uses and non-transferable and the user is responsible for their use and disclosure to third parties . The information contained in the links is confidential . Brisbox prohibits the publication of links to third parties and disclosure in forums, social networks and any we.
privacy_fourteen: By sending the forms understand that the user gives consent to process data in accordance with the purposes provided each of the forms. Brisbox does not communicate the data to third parties except in the cases legally established or authorized by the applicant. Brisbox communicates data holders its intention to send commercial communications by e -mail or any other means of electronic communication. holders also expressed know this intention and give their express consent to receive such communications. The consent here provided by the Holder for data communication to third parties is revocable at any time , without retroactive effect .
privacy_fifteen: Users must ensure the truthfulness, accuracy , authenticity and validity of the personal data that have been collected them.
invalid_amount: The amount must be greater than 50 cents
incorrect_cvc: The card's security code is incorrect
processing_error: An error occurred while processing the card
faqs_question_six: I'm not sure of the date of my move. Can I also make a reservation?
faqs_answer_six: Of course! You are free to set the date or cancel it free of charge.
faqs_answer_seven: A captain is a role assigned to the best experience brisboxer. The captain must contact with the client and make that all the order process goes amazing!
order-form_header: Do you need do a move?
info_money: You will be charged 5€ as a reservation fee but it will be deducted later from the total cost of the service.
info_promotion: Sure! To celebrate our launch, you can use the code PROBRISBOX for a 5€ discount.
info_stripe: We use Stripe as a payment gateway for its proven security and low transaction fees.
account-info-text: We will share your name with customers and use your email address and phone number to stay in touch with you.
image-profile-text: Be sure to choose a professional photo of you alone. If accepted, this picture will be sent to your customers, so make sure it's a good one!
order-form_more-info-hour: ¿How long will you need them (in total)?
email_verified_Success: Your email has been verified. We will get in touch with you as soon as possible to activate your account.
email_verified_Error: Your email hasn't been verified. Please try again later.
contact_us_body: Any questions? Do not hesitate to get in touch with us at hello@brisbox.com
contact_us_form: If you don't have an email client, don't worry, you can also complete this form and we will contact you as soon as possible
thanks_Email_body: Thanks you for sending us an email. You will receive response as fast as posible
thanks_Order_body: Thanks for trusting us. Our Brisboxers will contact you shortly.
assessment_body: We want to know your opinion about our brisboxers. Here you can express yourself, rating and adding a few comments about how each one performed.
my_orders_empty: You have not joined any order yet. Search through the available orders to get going.
agree_form: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.
registration_subheader: Help people move and earn up to 12€/h

terms21: The Services are communication platforms that facilitate the connection between you, the user of the Services, and third party providers, including independent third party labor providers under agreement with Brisbox (“Third Party Providers”), to arrange and schedule labor services performed by such Third Party Providers and NOT Brisbox. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT Brisbox DOES NOT PROVIDE ANY LABOR OR MOVING SERVICES OR FUNCTION AS A MOVING CARRIER. termsFinal: Thank you for visiting the Website.
welcome1: You are now just one step away from completing your inscription with us. To do this go to your inbox and click the link to verify your email.
welcome2: Then, we will contact with you to send a date for the selection process, after which it will activate your account so you can start using the application.
name: Name
order_deleted_success: Your order has been deleted. Thanks for your trust.
order_deleted_failed_body: There was an error cancelling your order. Please try again later.
enter-cancelation-code: Please search on your email the cancelation code and write it on the input field.
order_not_found_body1: Your order isn't found on the system. If you thing that was an error, please contact with Brisbox Team. If you have an email client, click on
order_not_found_body2: if don't, you can always can contact us clicking on
access_denied_body: We are sorry, you don't have enough access to this site.
order_dashboard_emptyBrisboxer: We are sorry, there are no brisboxers yet.

howHearAboutUs.label: How did you hear about Brisbox?

messages.emailNotStudent: Email must be an U.S. or U.P.O. university.
messages.wrongZip: ZIP Code must be a Seville ZIP
messages.minCount: You must specify at least [minCount] values
messages.maxCount: You cannot specify more than [maxCount] values
messages.keyNotInSchema: [key] is not allowed by the schema

1.msg: [label] must be a valid e-mail address

2.msg: [label] must be a valid e-mail address

5.msg: [label] must be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address

6.msg: [label] must be a valid IPv4 address

7.msg: [label] must be a valid IPv6 address

9.msg: [label] must be a valid alphanumeric ID

message-not_found: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for.
email_validation_first_p: Thank you for your interest in helping make moves a little less stressing :)
email_validation_second_p: Please, click this link to verify your email address.
email_validation_third_p: Once you've verified it, we will get in touch with you in order to activate your account. From that moment on, you will be able to see the moves available and start working on those which are convenient for you.
email_captain_first_p: Your experience in the battlefield has granted you the captaincy. Lead your fellow brisboxers to an efficient and satisfying move!
email_captain_second_p: As a captain, you must manage the team and let the customer know when you get to the destination. You must also confirm the total time worked for us to charge the customer the right amount.
email_captain_third_p: You can see a summary of the order here.
email_captain_fourth_p: To learn more about being a captain, visit this link.
email_order_registered_first_p: Your order has been sucessfully registered. We will notify you as soon as the requested number of brisboxers has been met.
email_order_registered_second_p: To access the dashboard and track the status of your order, click here.
email_order_registered_third_p: You can cancel your order up to 24h. before it takes place by visiting this link and using the following code:
email_brisboxer_complete_first_p: The requested number of brisboxers for your move has been met. The captain will get in touch with you on move day to tell you when they are there.
email_brisboxer_complete_second_p: Remember that you can check the dashboard anytime to see the status of your order. But don't worry, we will inform you may a brisboxer drop out.
email_brisboxer_complete_third_p: Thank you for trusting us and happy move!
email_brisboxer_left_first_p: Unfortunately, a brisboxer had to leave your order. But don't worry, we will list your order again for someone to fill in.
email_brisboxer_left_second_p: We will notify you as soon as your brisboxer team is complete again. Nonetheless, we remind you that you can check the status of your order in the dashboard anytime.
email_order_canceled_first_p: The order you were going to work in has been canceled by the customer. But do not despair, you can always look for another one that fits your schedule too.
brisboxer_details_empty_assessment: The brisboxer doesn't have any assessment yet.
monthly_stats_desc: Stats are calculated on a monthly basis. You will be timely paid the corresponding amount for each month by the start of the next one.
stripe_card_advice: Brisbox does not store your credit card information. That is why we ask for it again in the final payment.
finished_Order_body: Hopefully it was a satisfactory experience.
finished_Order_assessment: In order to improve our services, we would like you to take a moment and rate our brisboxers. We really appreciate your feedback.
